text: Nabii Yuusuf kay namma kataysak numuk teynay (isi amoytah gocoy xayyoysak suge num kinnuk) kaal heeniih kaa edde yeerreenimik bari yekkeeh rabak naggoowuwaam kak yeexege numuk: kaa moytih xaqul anu dambi maleh casbit yan numuy madluumuk yani kinniyom yoh kaah waris kaak iyye, tokkel woo num Nabii Yuusuf edde yan caalat amoytah warsam sheytan kaa hawweeniseeh Nabii Yuusuf casbit maggo sanoota suge
